Nov. 22, 2014 D SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest sewbba-blaenavon-contest-second-section
Rhydycar Leisure Centre, Merthyr Tydfil, Merthyr Tydfil County, Wales, UK Contest moved from Blaenavon Workmens' Hall to Merthyr Tydfil Leisure Centre.

2014: Welsh League Champion: City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) M2 Runner-Up: Ammanford
